example.parse: (S (VP (PSEUDO_VERB ان) (NP-SBJ-1 (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_ACC الكنيسة)) (S (VP (IV3FS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I تنمو) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *-1)))))) (PUNC ,) (CONJ و) (S (VP (IV3MS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I يتعمق) (NP-SBJ (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_NOM الايمان)) (PP (PREP في) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN قلوب) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN ابنائ) (NP (POSS_PRON_3FS ها)))))

arg.g: In the hearts of its sons
